title: SkinScope AI – Skincare Ingredient Safety Analyzer
description: Built an AI-powered skincare assistant that analyzes uploaded product images, performs OCR-based ingredient extraction, and uses LangChain RAG + FAISS retrieval to verify safety levels against dermatology and toxicology datasets. Integrated canonicalization and contextual safety-explanation chains, reducing manual ingredient research time by 90%.

title: Women Health Bot
description: I developed an AI Women Healthcare Chatbot using advanced NLU techniques to address women’s health concerns like symptom assessment, menstrual tracking, and mental wellness. It provides personalized, evidence-based guidance while ensuring privacy and security. This accessible tool empowers women to make informed health decisions and connects them to essential resources..

title: Mood Enhancer
description: Developed a mood-enhancing chatbot that transforms words into uplifting audio responses using Langchain and OpenAI's LLM. Achieved 90% response accuracy by implementing conversation memory to create meaningful interactions. Boosted user engagement by 50% through text-to-audio conversion with gTTS and Playdub, delivering an immersive auditory experience. Customized prompt templates for precise, context-aware replies, enhancing user satisfaction. Deployed the chatbot on Streamlit, offering an accessible and real-time interface for interactive user engagement.

title: Predicting Cognitive Decline using Transfer Learning
description: Designed a cognitive decline prediction model using EfficientNetB4, achieving a 15% improvement in accuracy through transfer learning strategies.• Enhanced training efficiency by 30% through Hyperband tuning and early stopping, reducing training time and minimizing overfitting. Increased diagnostic reliability with EfficientNetB4’s architecture, supporting early clinical interventions.

title: Crown-of-Thorns Starfish (COTS) Detection using Transformers
description: Built a Crown-of-Thorns Starfish (COTS) detection model using DETR (Detection Transformer), achieving 92% detection accuracy.• Fine-tuned a pretrained model on a dataset of 400 labeled images, reducing detection errors by 20%.• Improved training efficiency by 30% with PyTorch Lightning and optimized model performance using hyperparameter tuning, validated with a mAP score of 0.85.

title: Audio Assistant based Image Captioning System:
description: • Developed a real time audio captioning system, enhancing navigation accuracy by 35% for visually impaired users.• Improved processing speed by 25% by refining model integrations, allowing seamless user interaction .Attained 90% user satisfaction intesting, validating context aware descriptions for real world usage.

title: Pneumonia Detection using Deep Learning
description: • Created a CNN based model with 93% accuracy, reducing diagnostic time by 40% for faster healthcare interventions.• Verified clinical reliability through trials, confirming suitability for diagnostic applications. Standardized model performance across diverse imaging sources, ensuring scalability in clinical environments.

title: Tollywood Movie Recommendation System
description: • developed a Tollywood Movie Recommender System leveraging advanced machine learning algorithms to provide personalized movie suggestions. It analyzes user preferences, such as ratings, genres, and viewing patterns, to deliver accurate recommendations tailored to individual tastes. The system fosters user engagement by offering a seamless, intuitive experience and helps users discover diverse Tollywood movies that match their interests.
